possibleValues.detail: Three-letter abbreviated day name, for example: Sun, Mon, Tue, Wed, Thu, Fri, Sat.
Two-letter abbreviated day name, for example: Su, Mo, Tu, We, Th, Fr, Sa.
Zero-padded day of the month as a decimal number [01,31].
Space-padded day of the month as a decimal number [ 1,31]. Equivalent to %_d.
Day of the year as a decimal number [001,366].
Week number of the year as a decimal number [00,53]. Sunday is the first day of the week.
Week number of the year as a decimal number [00,53]. Monday is the first day of the week.
Year without century as a decimal number [00,99].
Year with century as a decimal number.

settings.example: SELECT time, entity, value FROM cpu_busy WHERE time > now - 5 * minute

[widget == 'chart'].deprecated: This setting is deprecated in timechart. Use `mode = stack` instead
